name: Invitation Homes Inc.
description: Invitation Homes Inc. is a leading owner and operator of single-family rental homes in the United States. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Dallas, Texas, the company focuses on acquiring, renovating, and leasing high-quality homes in desirable neighborhoods across 16 major markets. With a mission to provide quality homes for families and individuals, Invitation Homes has established a robust portfolio, making it one of the largest publicly traded single-family rental companies in the nation. The company emphasizes exceptional tenant experiences, offering online leasing services, maintenance requests, and a user-friendly resident portal. Invitation Homes is committed to responsible property management and sustainable practices, ensuring that their homes meet high standards of quality and safety. As a pioneer in the single-family rental sector, Invitation Homes aims to redefine the rental experience, providing homes that are both comfortable and professionally managed. With a strong focus on community engagement and customer satisfaction, the company continues to innovate in the residential real estate market.

seo.meta_title: Invitation Homes Inc. | Quality Single-Family Rental Homes
seo.meta_description: Explore Invitation Homes Inc., a leader in the single-family rental market, providing quality homes and exceptional living experiences.

faq.question: What does Invitation Homes do?
faq.answer: Invitation Homes acquires, renovates, and leases single-family homes across the United States.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Invitation Homes?
faq.answer: Dallas Tanner is the CEO of Invitation Homes Inc.

faq.question: Where is Invitation Homes headquartered?
faq.answer: Invitation Homes is headquartered in Dallas, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What types of homes does Invitation Homes offer?
faq.answer: Invitation Homes offers a range of single-family rental homes, including 3-bedroom and 4-bedroom options.
